content.raw:
the cpplint in osrf/gazebo doesn't like these initializaitons:

~~~
$ hg up gazebo10
...
$ tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -c 0
gazebo/rendering/SonarVisualPrivate.hh:44:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
gazebo/rendering/SonarVisualPrivate.hh:44:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
gazebo/rendering/SonarVisualPrivate.hh:59:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
gazebo/rendering/SonarVisualPrivate.hh:59:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
Total errors found: 4
~~~

do you mind if we change them to `= nullptr`?
content.html:
the cpplint in osrf/gazebo doesn't like these initializaitons:

$ hg up gazebo10
...
$ tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -c 0
gazebo/rendering/SonarVisualPrivate.hh:44:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
gazebo/rendering/SonarVisualPrivate.hh:44:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
gazebo/rendering/SonarVisualPrivate.hh:59:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
gazebo/rendering/SonarVisualPrivate.hh:59:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
Total errors found: 4

do you mind if we change them to = nullptr?
